meanings.definition: To waste time or effort on trivial or unnecessary tasks.
meanings.sent1: Stop futzing around and finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: I always futz with my phone when I'm bored.
meanings.sent3: Instead of futzing, let's get some work done.
meanings.sent4: She futzed away the afternoon on social media.
meanings.sent5: His constant futzing led to missed deadlines.

meanings.definition: To tinker or fiddle with something in an aimless or unproductive manner.
meanings.sent1: He likes to futz with old gadgets to see how they work.
meanings.sent2: She futzed with the radio until she found a station she liked.
meanings.sent3: The cat futzed with the yarn, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic futzed with the engine, trying to fix the issue.
meanings.sent5: Don't futz with the settings unless you know what you're doing.
